articles.clean_text: Hypothesis ileezhun/iStock via Getty Images Hypothesis ileezhun/iStock via Getty Images The Efficient Market Hypothesis [EMH] began its intellectual life in the mid-1960s with bold positive claims: 1. The market price reflects all available information. 2. The market price represents the best unbiased estimate of fundamental If you are really serious about improving your performance as an investor -- during this historic moment, which is providing once-in-a-decade opportunities -- I highly recommend that you subscribe to Successful Portfolio Strategy .
